Uses of Package
jparsec.astrophysics

  • Packages that use jparsec.astrophysics 
    Package Description
    jparsec.astrophysics
    Classes to operate with measurements and spectra in astrophysics.
    jparsec.astrophysics.gildas
    Classes to manipulate Gildas files.
    jparsec.astrophysics.photometry
    Classes to operate with astrophysical fluxes and photometric bands of instruments.
    jparsec.graph
    Creates charts using JFreeChart, SGT, VISAD, SurfacePlotter, and JMathPlot.
    jparsec.io
    Provides methods for input/output, such as to read catalogs or to create reports.
    jparsec.math
    Tools to apply different common math operations in astrophysics.
    jparsec.vo
    Classes to provide Virtual Observatory services.
  • Classes in jparsec.astrophysics used by jparsec.astrophysics 
    Class and Description
    FluxElement
    This class holds each point in a spectra or SEDs.
    HRDiagram
    This class allows to work with HR diagrams and to fit or calibrate those coming from observations of star clusters.
    MeasureElement
    The most simple representation of a measure: a value, its error, and the unit.
    PCAElement
    A class to hold the results of a PCA (Principal Component Analysis) calculation.
    SingleDish.TELESCOPE
    The set of telescopes.
    Spectrum
    This class holds data like spectra or SEDs.
    Table
    A handy class to manipulate 1d/2d/3d tables with measures, including errors and a mask of pixels within calculations, optionally.
  • Classes in jparsec.astrophysics used by jparsec.astrophysics.gildas 
    Class and Description
    Spectrum
    This class holds data like spectra or SEDs.
    Table
    A handy class to manipulate 1d/2d/3d tables with measures, including errors and a mask of pixels within calculations, optionally.

    This class holds data like spectra or SEDs.
